pages.text: Scattered in the ground are various ores, just waiting for you to get unburied - if you notice them, that is. It takes a keen eye to distinguish those anomalies from normal stone, not an easy task for an ordinary player.

pages.title: Sparklestone
pages.text: A yellow ore that emits strong energy in the form of light. Sparklestone is found at all altitudes.

pages.title: Azurite
pages.text: A rich blue ore, which at first glance can almost be mistaken for lapis. However, it contains many impurities in its natural form, which must first be removed.

pages.title: Scarlet Ore
pages.text: This very heavy ore is scattered around the Nether. It's probably not the best idea to carry large amounts of it home at once.

pages.title: Paletur Ore
pages.text: The light blue color is the trademark of this ore. It is found exclusively in the end in small clusters. Like the end itself, the curious properties of this material are not to be overlooked.
